snippet: While you’re going about your daily life, having dinner with friends or going to a concert, people are watching you on Twitter, Facebook, Foursquare, Path and an interminable list of other social networks.
abstract: While you’re going about your daily life, having dinner with friends or going to a concert, people are watching you on Twitter, Facebook, Foursquare, Path and an interminable list of other social networks.

headline.main: Disruptions: Seeking Privacy in a Networked Age
headline.print_headline: Seeking Some Privacy In a Networked Age
